name: Zombie Defense Fortress
description:
ZOMBIE DEFENSE FORTRESS

A mix of base management and idle gameplay. 

Collect Resources, Find Survivors, Build Your Fortress!

WIP includes:
-Idle Gameplay mechanics that are completed. 
-3 levels of progression to build through. 
-The ability to find survivors. 

I will be releasing test builds for this game as they get done! Check back soon to see the progress!

Contact me if you want to work on the game!
